placement.headline: Artsy will connect you with our network of top tier partners

questions.headline: Have questions? We're here to help

sections.description: Artsy wants to make it easy and effective to buy and sell art. We partner with premier auction houses and other third parties to remove the stress from the selling process, and to give you access to the highest level of service.

sections.sub_headline: What happens once I submit a work?
sections.description: Submissions are routed to our network of auction house and third party partners. Our growing list of partners includes many of the top auction houses and galleries across the globe.
Artsy does not charge the user any fees. When we connect you with a partner, the partner will provide you an estimate of the fees they may charge you for their services.

sections.sub_headline: Want to learn more? Read our full FAQ or contact us.
